title: Stream: Pacific Air – Stop Talking
body:
Having smashed SXSW earlier in the year, our buddies in **Pacific Air** are set to take the rest of the world by storm with their debut LP, **_Stop Talking_**.

In little over a year the brothers have gone from relative unknowns to producing one of the essential summer albums of 2013. Featuring the singles _Lose My Mind_, _So Strange_ and one of the songs of SXSW 13, [Float](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBJO6_2CCUE), it’s a debut album that delves far deeper than the upbeat, anthem ready hooks that litter its surface. Dive into **_Stop Talking_** below and grab a copy on [iTunes here](http://smarturl.it/PacificAirStpTlkiniT).
